item.description:
Please join us for our Sunrise Ostara Celebration on Sunday, March 24, 2013

Come and join us for a joyous celebration of the Vernal Equinox and the return of Spring! This is a family event and children are welcome! As the light overtakes the darkness, we celebrate the warmth and beauty of the awakening Earth and this day paves the way for the coming lushness of summer. Ostara is a time when all elements within and without us are brought into harmony. A time of new life and rebirth, as well as the end of Winter! We plan on meeting at Hampton Beach
295 Ocean Blvd., Hampton Beach, NH, rain or shine.
Service starts at 4:30 AM sharp. Check http://www.moonpool.org for more details, click on the link that says “Open Circles”.

Dress warmly in layers, bring your drums and rattles, and get ready to have a very good time coaxing the first rays of light up over the clouds. The ritual is followed by a breakfast at a local establishment.

This is a wonderfully enriching, educational and fun event. Learn about different ways of celebrating the turns of the Wheel of the Year, meet new people and learn to share personal experiences, stories, laughter and joy in the spirit of the seasons!
item.how_to_find_us: Park in front of Ashworth by the Sea
item.name: Sunrise Ostara Service
